critique: The document expresses fear and disgust towards cartels and transnational organizations, emphasizing the threat they pose to national security. It also conveys a sense of determination to eliminate these threats. There is no explicit expression of joy or surprise. Sadness is present due to the negative impact of these organizations on society. The intensity of fear and disgust is high due to the described violence and destabilization. The intensity of sadness is moderate, reflecting concern for the affected communities. There is no surprise or joy.
